Chip Mounters

MX400LP (2010)

  • Vintage: 2009
  • Flow Direction: Left to Right (Front Rail Fixed)
  • Without Shuttles (Standard Type)
  • CPH: 35,000
  • Head: 6 Module + 3 Precision
  • PCB Size: 680 x 460 x 5.0mm
  • Weight: 1,700kg
  • Dimensions: 1,450 x 1,900 x 1,500mm
